title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-1.5 - Inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 350-1.5 - Inspection

State Regulations

Department personnel can enter any designated food scraps
generator's property or inspect records, at all reasonable times and locations, whether announced or unannounced, for the purpose of determining compliance
with this Part. For solid waste management facilities, the department may
inspect the facility to determine compliance with this Part, in accordance with
the criteria outlined in section
360.7
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
350-1.5

Adopted

New

York State Register August 11, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 32, eff. 1/1/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
